name: Plivo
long_description: Plivo's platform helps businesses create and deploy Voice AI Agents for various roles like customer support, marketing engagement, lead qualification including channels like WhatsApp, Chat & SMS. Plivo's platform powers billions of transactions each year globally for thousands of businesses worldwide like Uber, Meta, Zomato, Godaddy etc.
